about.title: Our Mission & Vision
about.subtitle: Empowering patients with real-time health insights and AI-driven support.

background.title: Why We Started
background.description: Elderly and chronic patients often lack reliable ways to track essential vitals outside clinical settings. Missing timely measurements can lead to preventable complications. We built CareCompanion to bridge this gap.

story.title: Our Journey
story.description: What began as a university project evolved into a comprehensive health monitoring solution. Our team combined expertise in AI, hardware integration, and user experience to create something truly impactful.

uniqueness.title: What Sets Us Apart
uniqueness.description: We don't just monitor—we predict, analyze, and guide. Our AI-powered insights help users understand their health patterns and take proactive steps.

projectIdea.title: Project Idea
projectIdea.description: A portable health device paired with a sophisticated Web/Mobile app that continuously measures Blood Pressure, Heart Rate, Temperature, Oxygen Saturation, and Glucose.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We developed a portable health device paired with a sophisticated Web/Mobile app—CareCompanion—that continuously measures Blood Pressure, Heart Rate, Temperature, Oxygen Saturation, and Glucose. Combined with AI-powered insights and personalized reminders, patients stay in control of their health.

projectBackground.title: Project Background
projectBackground.description: Our portable device features a comprehensive sensor suite including MAX30100 for SpO₂ and heart rate monitoring, MLX90614 for non-contact temperature measurement, AD8232 for ECG readings, and MPU6050 for movement detection. The device connects via Bluetooth to our mobile app, providing seamless real-time data transmission.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: React, React Native, Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Realtime DB), Tailwind CSS, AI Models (Gemini/GPT), Node.js/Cloud Functions for backend.

academicContext.title: Academic Context
academicContext.description: This is a Senior Graduation Project at King Salman International University, Software Engineering Department. Our academic advisors provide crucial guidance and oversight to ensure the project meets the highest standards.

mission.title: Mission Statement
mission.description: To empower patients to manage chronic conditions through real-time data and AI insights.
